column2: Columbia Seligman Premium Technology Growth Fund Inc

Columbia Seligman Premium Technology Growth Fund (the Fund) is a non-diversified closed-end fund. The Fund’s investment program consists primarily of investing in a portfolio of equity securities of technology and technology-related companies and writing call options on the NASDAQ 100 Index or its exchange-traded fund equivalent (the NASDAQ 100) on a month-to-month basis. The Fund may also buy or write other call and put options on securities, indices, exchange traded funds (ETFs) and market baskets of securities. The Fund invests in various sectors, including consumer discretionary, information technology, telecommunication services, application software, heavy electrical equipment, communications equipment, research and consulting services, semiconductor equipment and data processing & outsourced services. The Fund’s investment manager is Columbia Management Investment Advisers, LLC.
